News

  • Apr 2020 - I was elected as the chair of 2020 Graduation Committee at Hongyi Honor College, Wuhan University. We will help with the graduation events and procedures for the class of 2020 at our college.
  • Mar 2020 - I've got my offer of admission to a M.A.Sc graduate program at University of Toronto!
  • Feb 2020 - Participating in research at iQua group. Coming to Toronto again !
  • Jan 2020 - I've got a volunteer opportunity from a non-profit organization, ICCVTT, and I will serve as an English teacher for primary school students at rural area in Nan, Thailand for a month.
  • Sept 2019 - I'll take a research internship at iQua group under the guidance of Prof. Baochun Li, at The Edward S. Rogers Sr. Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering (ECE), University of Toronto.
  • May 2019 - Attending ACM TURC 2019: ACM Turing Celebration Conference - China at Chengdu, China.
  • Jan 2019 - Took part in COMAP's Mathematical Contest in Modeling (MCM) 2019 with two peer collaborators majoring in mathematics and finance.
  • Oct 2018 - Attending China National Computer Congress (CNCC) 2018 with the theme "Big Data Drives the Digital Economy" at Hangzhou, China.
  • Sept 2018 - On a 2-week academic exchange to top universities in the United States with my class fellows.
  • May 2018 - Joined the research group of Prof. Yanjiao Chen.
